quoteText: Know, first, who you are, and then adorn yourself accordingly.
Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are.
Minds are like parachutes. They only function when open.

OnlineQuote{quoteText='Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know.', quoteAuthor='Pema Chodron'}

quoteText: Winners have simply formed the habit of doing things losers don't like to do.
If you cannot be silent be brilliant and thoughtful.
No one has a finer command of language than the person who keeps his mouth shut.
When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive â€” to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect. It means you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
Freedom is not worth having if it does not connote freedom to err.
